text: Che ri qꞌij riꞌ, ri Jesús xuchapleꞌj utzijoxik chike ri utijoxelabꞌ chi keꞌ na pa ri tinimit Jerusalén, xuqujeꞌ kabꞌan na kꞌax che kumal ri kꞌamal taq kibꞌe ri winaq aꞌj Israel, ri kꞌamal taq kibꞌe ri e chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios xuqujeꞌ ri aꞌjtijabꞌ rech ri taqanik, xuqujeꞌ choqꞌaqꞌ kakamisax na, churox qꞌij kꞌut kakꞌastaj na uwach.
